channel.title: Noel - My Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Noel - My Personal Blog

item.title: Crossing the fence. A introduction to Memory Barriers
item.description: Every CPU executes programs that generate memory access operations. These operations can be performed by the CPU in any order it prefers, as long as the program’s causality is preserved.

item.title: Rust PolymorphMagic
item.description: Rust stands out for its impressive ability to provide zero-cost abstractions, a feature that ensures developers don’t have to sacrifice performance for advanced functionality.

item.title: Dive into streams with NodeJS
item.description: You know the time you had to fit that streaming code you wrote into your async/await promise workflow.
